extensionDescription.message: Click to preview, double click to open as normal click.

enableContainerIdentify.message: Keep open in the same container as original page

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindow.message: Close popup when origin window is focused

closeByEsc.message: Esc to close the current popup page (overrides page's default Esc behavior)

doubleTapKeyToSendPageBack.message: Double tap on specific key to send page back to original window.

blurEnable.message: Set blur effect on Original Window when popup

previewModeDisabledUrls.message: Disable on all links on these pages, one rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.

linkDisabledUrls.message: Disable pop-ups for the following URLs, one rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.
